CustomField.description: Compares target numbers versus actual numbers and tells if target numbers have been reached.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Event__r.Target_Type__c,"Registered"), ISBLANK(Event__r.Targeted_Registration__c), Event__r.Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c >= Event__r.Registered_Target__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Event__r.Target_Type__c,"Registered"), Event__r.Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c >= Event__r.Targeted_Registration__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Event__r.Target_Type__c,"Logged On"), Event__r.Actual_Attended_Qualified__c >= Event__r.Targeted_Registration__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Event__r.Target_Type__c,"Both"), Event__r.Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c >= Event__r.Registered_Target__c, Event__r.Actual_Attended_Qualified__c >= Event__r.Targeted_Registration__c ) ), "Target(s) Met", IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Event__r.Target_Type__c,"Registered"), ISBLANK(Event__r.Targeted_Registration__c), Event__r.Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c < Event__r.Registered_Target__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Event__r.Target_Type__c,"Registered"), Event__r.Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c < Event__r.Targeted_Registration__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Event__r.Target_Type__c,"Logged On"), Event__r.Actual_Attended_Qualified__c < Event__r.Targeted_Registration__c ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Event__r.Target_Type__c,"Both"), OR( Event__r.Qualified_Non_Sponsor__c < Event__r.Registered_Target__c, Event__r.Actual_Attended_Qualified__c < Event__r.Targeted_Registration__c ) ) ), "Target(s) Not Met", "Check Target Criteria" ) )
CustomField.label: Event Target(s) Met
